name: FloraChain
description: EVM-compatible L1 blockchain with the ability to host unlimited number of smart contracts, DApps, NFTs with Web3 technology - leading a new era in digital economy for all. Building a complete ecosystem - that includes Flora Wallet and Flora Web Browser with user reward system. Flora Yield Protocol (FYT) First staking pool that rewards USDT for staking. Yield is generated from various sources that includes Flora's Yield Loop concept and investments in financial markets.
